headline: Stanley Black & Decker, Enphase, and EVgo Shares Are Falling, What You Need To Know
summary: A number of stocks fell in the afternoon session after the U.S. threatened to impose "massive increases" to tariffs on China in response to new export controls from Beijing.

headline: Enphase Expands IQ Energy Management to Include Water Heaters
summary: ENPH expands its IQ Energy Management system to control electric water heaters, enhancing AI-driven smart home energy use across Europe.

raw.headline: Enphase Expands IQ Energy Management to Include Water Heaters

headline: Enphase Expands Smart Energy Management to Water Heaters in Europe
summary: Enphase Energy extends its IQ® Energy Management platform to include electric water heaters in Belgium, the Netherlands, and Switzerland.

raw.headline: Enphase Expands Smart Energy Management to Water Heaters in Europe
